<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This implements NewValueJump pass in Hexagon.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ideally, we should merge this as a Peephole pass prior to register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocation, but because we have a spill in between the feeder and new value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// jump instructions, we are forced to write after register allocation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Having said that, we should re-attempt to pull this earlier at some point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in future.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The basic approach looks for sequence of predicated jump, compare instruciton</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that genereates the predicate and, the feeder to the predicate. Once it finds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all, it collapses compare and jump instruction into a new value jump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intstructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonnewvaluejump-cpp-/hexagonnewvaluejump/#a634839e14669934feefea686924b5af9">HexagonNewValueJump::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="#a603ae8c2df43d9a8ac70780216b1e63b"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#aaa970fc931c1c63037a8182e028d04b1">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;BEGIN</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonnewvaluejump-cpp-/hexagonnewvaluejump/#a41a3de2f1a732fa667544f4285bf6f38">HexagonNewValueJump</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;hexagon-nvj&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Hexagon NewValueJump&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#a14724f1ccf528e73bb29bc9230737967">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;DEPENDENCY</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebranchprobabilityinfowrapperpass">MachineBranchProbabilityInfoWrapperPass</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="#a0e9c60a719a33067080d1127e6da3381"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#a74ce8276b89067e806f67c45a6d92575">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;END</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonnewvaluejump-cpp-/hexagonnewvaluejump/#a41a3de2f1a732fa667544f4285bf6f38">HexagonNewValueJump</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;hexagon-nvj&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="#a941a89e1a985bcd26de1fdbccf830264"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Hexagon NewValueJump&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have identified this II could be feeder to NVJ,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// verify that it can be.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="#a8d3e918d874e8e80cf9a403e8ea59e32"><span class="doxyHighlight">static </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a8d3e918d874e8e80cf9a403e8ea59e32">canBeFeederToNewValueJump</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo">HexagonInstrInfo</a> &#42;QII,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>::<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>::<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">iterator</a> end,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>::<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/inlineinfo-cpp/#ac05a52a6d1ce8dda0f50063c9c22e5f4">skip</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Predicated instruction can not be feeder to NVJ.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (QII-&gt;isPredicated(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bail out if feederReg is a paired register (double regs in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// our case). One would think that we can check to see if a given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register cmpReg1 or cmpReg2 is a sub register of feederReg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using -- if (QRI-&gt;isSubRegister(feederReg, cmpReg1) logic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before the callsite of this function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But we can not as it comes in the following fashion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %d0 = Hexagon&#95;S2&#95;lsr&#95;r&#95;p killed %d0, killed %r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %r0 = KILL %r0, implicit killed %d0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %p0 = CMPEQri killed %r0, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hence, we need to check if it&#39;s a KILL instruction.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that the (unique) def operand is a register from IntRegs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HadDef = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!Op.isReg() || !Op.isDef())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (HadDef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    HadDef = true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!Hexagon::IntRegsRegClass.contains(Op.getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(HadDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure there is no &#39;def&#39; or &#39;use&#39; of any of the uses of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// feeder insn between its definition, this MI and jump, jmpInst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// skipping compare, cmpInst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here&#39;s the example.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    r21=memub(r22+r24&lt;&lt;#0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Without this check, it will be converted into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    r4=memub(r3+r21&lt;&lt;#0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    r21=memub(r22+r24&lt;&lt;#0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    p0 = cmp.eq(r21, #0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    if (p0.new) jump:t .LBB29&#95;45</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and result WAR hazards if converted to New Value Jump.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getNumOperands(); ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> foundFeeder = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> feederPos = MII;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).isReg() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).isDef() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg() == cmpReg1 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">             (isSecondOpReg &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg() == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)cmpOp2))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> feederReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First try to see if we can get the feeder from the first operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the compare. If we can not, and if secondOpReg is true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (second operand of the compare is also register), try that one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Try to come up with some heuristic to figure out which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// feeder would benefit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (feederReg == cmpReg1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a8d3e918d874e8e80cf9a403e8ea59e32">canBeFeederToNewValueJump</a>(QII, QRI, MII, jmpPos, cmpPos, MF)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isSecondOpReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!foundFeeder &amp;&amp; isSecondOpReg &amp;&amp; feederReg == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)cmpOp2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a8d3e918d874e8e80cf9a403e8ea59e32">canBeFeederToNewValueJump</a>(QII, QRI, MII, jmpPos, cmpPos, MF))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In case of CMPLT, or CMPLTU, or EQ with the second register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to newify, swap the operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> COp = cmpInstr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we have swapped the operands, all we need to check is,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the second operand (after swap) is the feeder.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And if it is, make a note.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (feederReg == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)cmpOp2)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we are moving feeder close the jump,</span></CodeLine>
